Title: Autumn Sonata
Cast: Ingrid Bergman, Liv Ullmann, Lena Nyman, Halvar Björk, Marianne Aminoff, Arne Bang-Hansen, Gunnar Björnstrand, Erland Josephson, Georg Løkkeberg, Mimi Pollak, Linn Ullmann
Plot: A married daughter who longs for her mother's love gets visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist. After having neglected her children for many years, world famous pianist Charlotte visits her daughter Eva in her home. To her surprise she finds her other daughter, Helena, there as well. Helena is mentally disabled, and Eva has taken Helena out of the institution where their mother had placed her. The tension between Charlotte and Eva only builds up slowly, until a nightly conversation releases all the things they have wanted to tell each other. Written by Mattias Thuresson
Keywords: pianist, marriage, bad mother, female protagonist, widow
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 6 nominations.
Actors: Ingrid Bergman, Liv Ullmann, Lena Nyman
Description: Directed by Ingmar Bergman.  With Ingrid Bergman, Liv Ullmann, Lena Nyman, Halvar Björk. A married daughter who longs for her mother's love gets visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.
